mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, place_id, sport_code, photo_id, title, create_at, updated_at, exercise_duration, content, is_public) VALUES (#{userId}, #{placeId}, #{photoId}, #{sportCode}, #{photoId}, #{title}, now(), now(), #{exerciseDuration}, #{content}, #{isPublic})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Post p WHERE p.user_id IN ( SELECT u.user_id FROM User u INNER JOIN Friend f ON (f.from_user = u.user_id OR f.to_user = u.user_id) WHERE (f.from_user = #{userId} OR f.to_user = #{userId}) AND f.status = 1 AND u.user_id != #{userId}) AND p.is_public = 1;
